posts.post_content:
I dislike her.  
I am pretending to have a shield's down moment, then you attack, I put her into play, and you bolt her. Not good.  
If you play [to arms](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=to arms) instead, you manage the same surprise and card advantage for one mana less, and you only have to resolve it.

posts.post_content: Humorless? I call shenanigans. Her ability is absolutely hilarious to see in action flashed in after an alpha strike. I would comment on the fact that once your opponents have seen her in action once it kinda ruins the fun, but that is simply the beginning of the second round I like to call "am I bluffing my a\*\* off, or are you screwed if you attack me?" which is also quite enjoyable.
